Class Encyclopedia.Builder

java.lang.Object
book.Book.Builder
book.Encyclopedia.Builder
Enclosing class:
Encyclopedia
public static class Encyclopedia.Builder extends Book.Builder
Builder pattern for creating an Encyclopedia.

This builder extends Book.Builder and adds support for the illustration property.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Builder(String title, String author)
    Creates a new builder for an encyclopedia with the specified title and author.
